Yes I played it on Winamp?

Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:          Hi Rees,

if the error occurs only on your laptop but not on your other PC, it's
possible that your PC's soundcard doesn't support the sample parameters
(sample rate, bits) of that wav file (which I suppose had been created
on the laptop, right?). Did you try to play the same wav file in another
audio program than EVPmaker on your PC?

Stefan

-- 

> Steve, Stefan, or Bruce

> I have got a problem with my EVP maker. I clicked on the yellow play 
> button, and I got a Wave out Error that says "The specified format is 
> not supported or can not be translated. Use the Capabilities function 
> to determine the support formates". Then I thought since I had wave 
> pad open that was the problem, but I shut wave pad down. Its still is 
> saying the same thing. I am trying to use it on Windows 2000 
> Professional on my Home cpu. Please let me know if there is away I can 
> fix my problem. 

> EVP maker works on my laptop, but not my home cpu.

> Thanks 

> Rees
